What should I do, what should I do?"},{"lineNumber":35533,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、お、落ち着いて欲しいにゃん、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"P-please calm down, nya,"},{"lineNumber":35534,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Risu...\""},{"lineNumber":35535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そそそ、そうだわん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes, y-yes, that's right, wan."},{"lineNumber":35536,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブリス様が負けっこないわん」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Cavebriss won't lose, wan.\""},{"lineNumber":35537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おめーら……そう、おめーらは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You guys... yes, you guys..."},{"lineNumber":35538,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おめーらも働くんだよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"You all work too!"},{"lineNumber":35539,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様の役に立て！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Be useful to me!\""},{"lineNumber":35540,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひぃっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!?\""},{"lineNumber":35541,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、でも、ワンたちで、あんな人間ども……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-but, us wans, such humans..."},{"lineNumber":35542,"originalJapaneseLine":"　と、止められっこない、わん……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"C-can't possibly stop them, wan...!"},{"lineNumber":35543,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一分一秒でも良い！　時間を稼げ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even one minute, one second is good! Buy time!"},{"lineNumber":35544,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死んだって構わねぇ！","translatedEnglishLine":"I don’t care if you die!"},{"lineNumber":35545,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今だ、今、この瞬間……っ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Now, now, this very moment...!"},{"lineNumber":35546,"originalJapaneseLine":"未だに命を繋いでいる美樹へ、視線を向ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"I direct my gaze toward Miki, who is still clinging to life."},{"lineNumber":35547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺は…………魔王に、なるっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I... will become the Demon King...!\""},{"lineNumber":35548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐ、っ……う、ぅっ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guh... uh...!"},{"lineNumber":35549,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケイブ、リスっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Cave, Risu...!\""},{"lineNumber":35550,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐ、ぐおお、っ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"G-guoh...!"},{"lineNumber":35551,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あ、頭が、ぐらぐらする……っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"My head is reeling...\""},{"lineNumber":35552,"originalJapaneseLine":"いっそう濃くなっていく恐瘴気に、","translatedEnglishLine":"In the increasingly thick miasma of terror,"},{"lineNumber":35553,"originalJapaneseLine":"今にも足を止めてしまいそうになりながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Almost stopping in my tracks,"},{"lineNumber":35554,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は奥へと足を進める。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others press onward deeper inside."},{"lineNumber":35555,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お……おぉ、もう……少し、だぜ、たぶん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh, just... a little more, probably...\""},{"lineNumber":35556,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ……くそ。俺はいよいよ、限界かも知れん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch... damn. I might be reaching my limit..."},{"lineNumber":35557,"originalJapaneseLine":"　幻聴が聞こえやがる……","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m hearing auditory hallucinations..."},{"lineNumber":35558,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どすんばたんと、騒がしい奴が耳から離れねぇ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Noisy sounds banging around won't leave my ears..."},{"lineNumber":35559,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………っ。それは……自分も、同じです……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I’m the same way..."},{"lineNumber":35560,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これは……っ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"This is...\""},{"lineNumber":35561,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………確かに、聞こえる。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I can definitely hear it."},{"lineNumber":35562,"originalJapaneseLine":"　幻聴ではない……この先に……何か、いる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s not a hallucination... something is ahead!"},{"lineNumber":35563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あ、あわわわ……ど、どうするわん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-a-awawa... wh-what do we do, wan..."},{"lineNumber":35564,"originalJapaneseLine":"　に、人間が……もうそこまで来てるわん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"H-humans... they're already that close, wan...\""},{"lineNumber":35565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「か、勝てるわけがないにゃん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"T-there's no way we can win, nya..."},{"lineNumber":35566,"originalJapaneseLine":"　うう、で、でも、リス様が……","translatedEnglishLine":"U-uh, but Lord Risu..."},{"lineNumber":35567,"originalJapaneseLine":"「に……逃げちゃう、わん……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"I-is he... running away, wan...?"},{"lineNumber":35568,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、い、いくらけろけろ吐きそうでも、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, no matter how much I feel like puking,"},{"lineNumber":35569,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ニャン達はリス様の使徒にゃん！","translatedEnglishLine":"The Nyans are Lord Risu’s followers, nya!"},{"lineNumber":35570,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのプライドに賭けて…………","translatedEnglishLine":"I stake my pride on that..."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間が侵入してきた。
その事態に際し、激昂寸前のケイブリスに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Faced with that situation, Cavebriss was on the verge of rage,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 臆さず意見を具申した……その、結末だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But without hesitation, I offered my opinion... and that was the outcome.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでだ……なんでこうなった……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why... why did it come to this...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔王は、まだ…………くそっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Demon King is still... damn it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この洞窟に引き籠もれば、簡単には見つからない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I hide away in this cave, they won't find me easily.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それまでに、魔軍が押し潰すだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By that time, the demon army would have crushed them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう考えていたケイブリスの予想は、空振り。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cavebriss’s prediction was a complete miss.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類は驚くほど速く魔軍を制圧し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humans suppressed the demon army astonishingly quickly,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 驚くほど早くここを突き止めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And found this place surprisingly fast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうなってんだ、っ……！」
焦る。どうすればいい、どうすれば。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Panic. What should I do, what should I do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、お、落ち着いて欲しいにゃん、
リス様……」
「そ、そそそ、そうだわん。
ケイブリス様が負けっこないわん」
「おめーら……そう、おめーらは……」
「おめーらも働くんだよ！
俺様の役に立て！」
「ひぃっ！？」
「で、でも、ワンたちで、あんな人間ども……
と、止められっこない、わん……！」
「一分一秒でも良い！　時間を稼げ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even one minute, one second is good! Buy time!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死んだって構わねぇ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t care if you die!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今だ、今、この瞬間……っ……！」
未だに命を繋いでいる美樹へ、視線を向ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I direct my gaze toward Miki, who is still clinging to life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「俺は…………魔王に、なるっ……！」
ケイブ、リスっ……！」
「ぐ、ぐおお、っ……
あ、頭が、ぐらぐらする……っ……」
いっそう濃くなっていく恐瘴気に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the increasingly thick miasma of terror,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今にも足を止めてしまいそうになりながら、
ランス達は奥へと足を進める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others press onward deeper inside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お……おぉ、もう……少し、だぜ、たぶん……」
「ちっ……くそ。俺はいよいよ、限界かも知れん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch... damn. I might be reaching my limit...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幻聴が聞こえやがる……
どすんばたんと、騒がしい奴が耳から離れねぇ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Noisy sounds banging around won't leave my ears...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………っ。それは……自分も、同じです……
これは……っ……」
「…………確かに、聞こえる。
幻聴ではない……この先に……何か、いる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s not a hallucination... something is ahead!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あ、あわわわ……ど、どうするわん……
に、人間が……もうそこまで来てるわん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-humans... they're already that close, wan..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「か、勝てるわけがないにゃん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-there's no way we can win, nya...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うう、で、でも、リス様が……
「に……逃げちゃう、わん……？」
「うう、い、いくらけろけろ吐きそうでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, no matter how much I feel like puking,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニャン達はリス様の使徒にゃん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Nyans are Lord Risu’s followers, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのプライドに賭けて…………
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I stake my pride on that...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By that time, the demon army would have crushed them.

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t care if you die!

未だに命を繋いでいる美樹へ、視線を向ける。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Noisy sounds banging around won't leave my ears...

に、人間が……もうそこまで来てるわん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: H-humans... they're already that close, wan..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「か、勝てるわけがないにゃん……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-there's no way we can win, nya...

「うう、い、いくらけろけろ吐きそうでも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, no matter how much I feel like puking,

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Nyans are Lord Risu’s followers, nya!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのプライドに賭けて…………
